tool_description: Livescore API provides information about all live and finished football matches
name: Football Livescore
title: Football Livescore

api_list.name: Live matches
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all live matches for the day. ( ** 50 results per page **). Sometimes you will see matches with "status": "FT" marked as live. That happens if the match has recently finished and we haven't confirmed the result yet. You will also get matches that are starting soon, if any.

api_list.name: Finished matches
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all finished matches for the day. ( ** 50 results per page **)

api_list.name: By Match ID
api_list.description: Returns the match (live or finished) with the provided match id.

api_list.name: By Country Code
api_list.description: Returns the matches (live or finished) filtered by the provided Country Code (or International Code).

api_list.name: By League Code
api_list.description: Returns the matches (live or finished) filtered by the provided Country Code (or International Code) and League.

api_list.name: All Countries
api_list.description: Get all countries for today matches.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-livescore.p.rapidapi.com/v1/utils/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-livescore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All matches
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all live and finished matches for the day. ( ** 50 results per page **)

api_list.name: All leagues
api_list.description: Get all leagues available for today matches. (sorted by Country)

api_list.name: All teams
api_list.description: Get all available teams for today matches
